front.title: •Arica
front.gametext: Deploys only to a site as an Undercover spy. While present, reduces Luke's forfeit and immunity to attrition by 2 here. During opponent's control phase, Arica may 'break cover' to fire one weapon (for free). Immune to attrition < 4.
front.lore: Mara Jade posed as a dancer at Jabba's Palace in an attempt to complete her master's task and kill Luke. Musician. Spy. Unable to convince Jabba to take her on his skiff.

rulings: If Arica breaks cover at Luke's site and There Is Good In Him on table, Luke is captured before Arica fires her weapon.
